More About Me
Our services run deep and are backed by over ten years of experience.

@graph.name: Meighan Brodkey
@graph.description: Salesforce MVP, Slack pusher, learning fanatic, detail obsessed, WIT User Group leader, Technical Architect, ❤️ challenges. Former Girl Scout, current rockstar.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Make A Mobile Publisher App for Communities Hands-on Virtual Workshop
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: This virtual workshop was to learn how to build rich digital experiences for your partners using External Apps, enabling them to collaborate on data and processes that live both inside and outside of Salesforce. Then publish that experience to the web and to the App Store or Google Play and…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dreamforce Admin & Dev Recap
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Join us as 3 Salesforce MVP‘s, Eric Dreshfield, Mike Martin, and Meighan Brodkey, bring Dreamforce ‘19 to you. Our Dreamforce19 recap panel will answer the questions you want to know about the best admin/dev sessions, favorite tips and takeaways and more.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Conga Composer
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Conga Composer is not only an amazing app for your Salesforce org, but it is an amazing company with customer service that will blow your mind.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Ideas
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Salesforce IdeasThe IdeaExchange was designed so that we would have the opportunity to share what we, as the end users of Salesforce, the people that use it everyday, want and need as features and functionality.It's awesome. It's one of the most amazing, dare I even say revolutionary opportunities that we…
